code: import{Storage}from'chrome-storage';import{chrome}from'chrome-extension';export const saveCommands=commands=>{return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{Storage.sync.set({commands},()=>{if(chrome.runtime.lastError){reject(chrome.runtime.lastError.message);}else{console.log('Commands saved successfully!');resolve();}});});};export const getCommands=()=>{return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{Storage.sync.get(['commands'],result=>{if(chrome.runtime.lastError){reject(chrome.runtime.lastError.message);}else{const commands=result.commands||[];resolve(commands);}});});};
